promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute epic chameleon fire-type wearing a ruby mask. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Rubiraptor, a chibi cute epic chameleon fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: will-o-wisp, double-slap. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word chameleon or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, chameleon-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: Fiery Rubiraptor loves to sunbathe in the desert and blend in with the sand. It stuns foes with its fast slaps and a mysterious glow.
